alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 09 at 2:02AM MDT until May 09 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 40 mph with gusts exceeding 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, East Platte County and North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; North Snowy Range Foothills
